description: Bridges: Method `updateNavigationNode()` must have `public function update<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionRequestTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer;` signature.

Bridges: Method `deleteNavigationNode()` must have `public function delete<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionDeleteCriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer;` signature.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `updateNavigationNode()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
